thread.title: Henrik Haaning Nielsen, Avifauna Consult
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Henrik Haaning Nielsen, Avifauna Consult

author: Henrik Haaning Nielsen, Avifauna Consult
title: Henrik Haaning Nielsen, Avifauna Consult
text: The service was effective especially when we returned the car. When we picked up the car, we had to make descisions to other offers concerning upgrades of the car standard, new types of insurances etc. All that we had already decided back home, when we ordered the car. In that way it was kind of innoying that we had to consider other descisions - all we wanted was just to pick up the car and start enjoying our vacation. Apart from that, we were very satisfied about the service.
